SEARCH
Package com.api.synco.module.course.domain.service

Class CourseService

java.lang.Object
com.api.synco.module.course.domain.service.CourseService
@Service public class CourseService extends Object
Domain service for course management operations.

This service coordinates course-related business operations by delegating to appropriate use cases and handling the mapping between domain entities and DTOs.

Responsibilities:

  • Course creation with permission checks
  • Course deletion with permission checks
  • Course updates
  • Course retrieval by ID
  • Paginated course listing with filters
Since:
1.0.0
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Luca5Eckert

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseService

      public CourseService(CourseMapper courseMapper, CreateCourseUseCase createCourseUseCase, DeleteCourseUseCase deleteCourseUseCase, UpdateCourseUseCase updateCourseUseCase, GetAllCourseUseCase getAllCourseUseCase, GetCourseUseCase getCourseUseCase)
      Constructs a new course service with the required dependencies.
      Parameters:
      courseMapper - the mapper for converting between entities and DTOs
      createCourseUseCase - the use case for course creation
      deleteCourseUseCase - the use case for course deletion
      updateCourseUseCase - the use case for course updates
      getAllCourseUseCase - the use case for retrieving multiple courses
      getCourseUseCase - the use case for retrieving a single course

  • Method Details

    • create

      public CreateCourseResponse create(CreateCourseRequest createCourseRequest, long idUser)
      Creates a new course in the system.
      Parameters:
      createCourseRequest - the request containing course data
      idUser - the ID of the authenticated user performing the creation
      Returns:
      the created course data

    • delete

      public void delete(DeleteCourseRequest deleteCourseRequest, long idUser)
      Deletes a course from the system.
      Parameters:
      deleteCourseRequest - the request containing the course ID to delete
      idUser - the ID of the authenticated user performing the deletion

    • update

      public UpdateCourseResponse update(UpdateCourseRequest updateCourseRequest, long idCourse, long idUser)
      Updates an existing course.
      Parameters:
      updateCourseRequest - the request containing updated course data
      idCourse - the ID of the course to update
      idUser - the ID of the authenticated user performing the update
      Returns:
      the updated course data

    • getCourse

      public GetCourseResponse getCourse(long id)
      Retrieves a course by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the course
      Returns:
      the course data

    • getAll

      public List<GetAllCourseResponse> getAll(String name, String acronym, int pageNumber, int pageSize)
      Retrieves a paginated list of courses with optional filters.
      Parameters:
      name - filter by name containing this value (optional)
      acronym - filter by acronym containing this value (optional)
      pageNumber - the page number to retrieve (0-based)
      pageSize - the number of courses per page
      Returns:
      a list of courses matching the criteria
